questions: What is the bus factor of your most important software project?
Original title: --  --  --  --  --  -- What is the bus factor of your most important software project? --  --  --  --  --  -- Your "most important software project" is the work-related project that you believe to have had the greatest impact on the research community. --  --  --  -- The "bus factor" designates the minimal number of developers that have to be hit by a bus (or quit) before a project is incapacitated. --  --  --  --
